The reason of requesting this loan is that Beatriz needs the cash because when she buys wholesale, the inputs are cheaper and she can save a little. Beatriz faces challenges to her business such as having to get up very early when it is cold in order to prepare her food and to transport it to her food stall. She is going to use the profits to buy more inputs and offer her customers a better service. Her wish for her business is to have a place from where to prepare and sell her delicious dishes, and in this way move forward in life.

loans.use: To buy inputs such as groceries and vegetables.

loans.name: Sotero

texts.es:
Sotero de 57 años nunca fue a la escuela ya que sus padres no creían en el estudio y que solo el trabajo le serviría en la vida, está acompañado y su pareja le ayuda en el trabajo de la agricultura, sus 3 últimos hijos viven con ellos por lo que son 4 personas que dependen de él.


Sotero ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y lo aprendió de su padre, pues desde niño anduvo con él, se traslada 5 km en bicicleta para llegar donde tiene su parcela, hora de salida no tiene, pues hay momentos en los que termina temprano.

El dinero del préstamo será utilizado para la siembra de maíz,  comprara semilla, abono, herbicidas, pesticidas; ya que en estos meses empiezan a trabajar porque en estos días comienzan a movilizarse.


Los sueños de Sotero son: Tener una vivienda digna, poder trabajar y darle lo necesario a sus hijos y sabe que con la ayuda de Dios y  su esfuerzo lo podrá hacer  posible.
texts.en:
Sotero is 57 years old and never went to school because his parents didn't believe in studying. They believed that work is all that is important in life. He lives with his life partner who helps him with the farming. Their three youngest children live with them, so there are four people who are dependent on Sotero. He has worked in farming all his life and learned from his father, accompanying him as a child.

He pedals his bicycle 5 km. to his plot of land and doesn't have a quitting time. Sometimes he finishes early. The money from the loan will be used to buy seeds, manure, herbicide, and pesticide to grow corn - this time of year is when the planting season begins. 

Soter's dreams are to have a dignified dwelling and to be able to work and give the necessities to his children. He knows that with God's help and his own effort, it will be possible to accomplish this.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, herbicide, and pesticide to grow corn as this is the beginning of the planting season.

loans.name: José Reynaldo

texts.es:
José de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado. Su esposa se dedica al comercio, tiene dos hijos de 13 y 7 años de edad, todos viven en la casa, los hijos estudian y 3 personas dependen de él. 

José es agricultor en pequeño, el padre le enseño ese trabajo, lo ha desempeñado toda la vida y también se dedica a la cría de ganado. El préstamo lo utilizara para cultivar más granos básicos, para preparar la tierra, comprar semillas y fertilizantes para establecer su cultivo.

 El cliente planea en un futuro mejorar la condición de vida de su familia, suplir otras necesidades y tener más ingresos para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 32 years old and has a ninth grade education.  He is married and his wife is a merchant.  They have two children, ages 13 and 7 and both live at home and attend school.  Three people depend on him for support.

Jose is a small farmer, having learned this trade from his father.  He has done this his whole life, as well as raising livestock.  He will use the money from this loan to raise more basic grains; prepare the land, buy seeds and fertilizer to establish the crops.

He plans to improve his family’s living condition in the future, meet additional needs, and have more income for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase of liquid fertilizers, urea, and manure among other items to be able to maintain her coffee crops.

loans.name: Milton

texts.es: Milton tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su hija de 8 años de edad. Milton es un hombre trabajador comprometido con su familia. Él trabaja como empleado en una constructora cercana a su localidad y es así como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar y junto a su compañera de vida mantienen la economía del hogar. Milton ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pila con lavadero por lo que necesita materiales como ladrillo, cemento, arena, lamina, polines y para pagar la mano obra necesaria para la construcción.
texts.en:
Milton, age 45, lives in his own house with his wife and his eight year old daughter.  Milton is a hard-working man who is committed to his family.  He works as an employee for a nearby builder in his area.  This is how he manages to bring sustenance to his household.  Together with his life partner they support the household.

Milton has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to build a laundry area.  In order to do, so he will need materials like bricks, cement, sand, metal sheeting, and beams.  He will also pay for the labor needed for the construction.

loans.use: to buy materials and to pay for labor to build a laundry area.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a water basin.

loans.name: Laguna De Cristal Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario lo integran cinco socias exitosas, coordinado por la señora Dora una socia exitosa en su vida laboral, de 45 años y casada, se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado en su comunidad y mercado más cercano, este negocio lo impulso desde hace 17 años y solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como es camisetas, blusas, talladores, licras, pantalones, cremas corporales, cremas para las manos, perfumes, vanidades, etc., afirma que el éxito de mantener el negocio ha sido conocer el gusto de la población. Las otras socias son las señoras Ángela de 58 años comerciante de frutas y verduras en el mercado de granada, Francisca de 55 años  negociante de frutas en la capital del país de manera ambulante, Sujey de 25 años la cual vende nacatamales en su domicilio y Yorlene  de 40 años propietaria de una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of five successful members and coordinated by Dora.  She is member, successful in her professional life, is 45 years old, married, and who sells clothing and shoes in her community and at the nearby market.  She stared this business 17 years ago and is asking for a loan to buy merchandise such as t-shirts, blouses, tights, pants, body creams, hand lotion, perfumes, vanity items, etc.  She says that her success in her business comes from knowing the people.  The other members, 58 year old Angela sells fruits and vegetables in the Granada market; 55 year old Francisca sells fruit on foot in the capital city; Sujey is 25 and sells nacatamales out of her home; Yorlene is 40 and has a store in her home.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Eleticia

texts.es:
Eleticia de 56 años de edad, está casada, se dedica a la agricultura, solo un hijo vive con ella, tres miembros habitan la casa, un hijo no estudia. Tres personas dependen de ella. Toda la vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, sus padres le enseñaron el oficio, el hijo que vive con ella le ayuda y aparte de eso cría cerdos y ganado, en este oficio se involucra su esposo e hijos. 

El crédito lo utilizara para comprar semilla, abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas, pesticidas para mejorar la cosecha y la agricultura será mejor y así tener granos básicos para ella y su familia y poder vender el resto. El cliente planea en un futuro que su cultivo tenga un buen rendimiento y así tener más ingresos para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Eleticia is 56 years old, married, and is a farmer.  Only one of her children lives with her and a total of three people live in her home.  One of her children does not attend school and three people depend on her for support.  She has been farming her whole life, having learned from her parents.  The son who lives with her helps out and also raises pigs and livestock.  Her husband and children also do this.

She will use the money from this loan to buy seeds, compost, fertilizer, herbicides, and pesticides to improve the harvest.  The crops will be better and she will have basic grains for her and her family and be able to sell the rest.  She plans for her harvest to be profitable in the future and have a greater income for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe es soltera no tiene hijos y vive en El Alto en una casa de adobe, ella vive junto a sus padres, los cuales son los dueños del inmueble Guadalupe tiene una tienda de abarrotes/comestibles y entre las condiciones duras de trabajo ella debe  mover pesadas cargas sola. Guadalupe necesita credito para incrementar la mercaderia de su tienda (refrescos, comestibles en general, pan) para mejorar su calidad de vida Guadalupe cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres pero esto no es suficiente por eso necesita su ayuda.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is single, and she does not have children.  She lives in an adobe house in El Alto.  She lives with her parents, who are the owners of the property.  Guadalupe has a grocery/food store.  Under hard working conditions, she needs to move heavy loads herself.

Guadalupe needs the loan to increase the merchandise in her store (soft drinks, general food, bread) in order to improve her quality of life.  Guadalupe has her parents’ support, but this is not enough.  That is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to increase the merchandise (soft drinks, general food, bread) for her neighborhood store.

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es: Yovana se dedica a la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde tiene plátanos, piñas, hoja de coca. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora que pertenece al banco comunal “Paititi”. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Yovana works in agriculture.  She has various plots of land where she grows bananas, pineapples, and coca leaves.  She has been in this business for several years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.  

She is an enterprising and hard-working person who belongs to the “Paititi” communal bank.

At the time she needs the loan to buy fertilizers.  She is grateful for and values the loan.  She pledges to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Berta Juana

texts.es: Juana se dedica a brindar servicio de hospedaje pues tiene un local donde llegan pasajeros extranejros y nacional. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora que pertenece al banco comunal “Paititi”. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las habitaciones. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Juana provides lodging service.  She has a place where guests, foreign and national, come.  She has had the business for several years.  It is going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.  

She is an enterprising and hard-working person who belongs to the “Paititi” communal bank.

At this time she needs the loan to perform maintenance on the rooms.  She is grateful for and values the loan.  She pledges to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on the rooms.

loans.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es: Maria de 45 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado afuera de su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por los precios accesibles y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vende, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de  maíz, arroz, chicharon, queso, frijoles, tomates, repollo, etc. y así continuar con su trabajo y poder tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 45 years old and has been making and selling pupusas for several years outside her home.  She has many customers because of the good prices and friendly service she gives.  She lives with relatives in a home of her own.  Maria is asking for this loan to buy corn, rice, pork rinds, cheese, beans, tomatoes, and cabbage, etc. so she can continue working and have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es: Magdalena de 44 años de edad posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia tiene varios clientes por la variedad de productos que comercializa y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, Magdalena está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor y seguir con su negocio y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Magdalena is 44 years old and has a small store in her home.  She has several customers because of the quality of goods and prices.  She uses her profits to pay the household expenses and has a home of her own along with her husband and daughter.  Magdalena is asking for this loan to buy more merchandise in quantity so she can continue her business and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Celia Maria

texts.es: Celia de 37 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa alquilada con sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda en su casa e habitación desde hace 12 años, tiene muchos clientes pues vende una variedad de productos y a precios accesibles, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de la casa y darle a sus hijos lo necesario, Celia está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como: granos básicos, pan dulce, golosinas, refrescos, detergentes, sopas, jabón, etc. todo por mayor para poder surtir aun más la tienda y darle una mejor atención a los clientes y así ella pueda obtener mejores ganancias y darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Celia is 37 years old and the single mother of two children.  She lives in a rented house and has had a store there for the past 12 years.  She has many customers because she sells a variety of products at affordable prices.  She pays her household expenses and provides for her children’s needs with her earnings.  Celia is asking for a loan to buy more products such as basic grains, pastries, snacks, soft drinks, detergents, soups, soap, etc. in quantity so she can stock her store and provide better customer service.  This way she will be able to increase her earnings and provide a better quality of life for her children without limits.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cereal

loans.name: Kavithe

texts.en:
Kavithe is a 46-year-old married woman. She has 5 children. She describes herself as polite. She operates a farm where she grows maize and bananas. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of funds. She will use the 30,000 KES loan to buy water pipes, fertilizer, and pesticides. 

Her business goal is to be a well known farmer within 5 years. This is her fourth  loan with SMEP Micro finance Bank. Previous loans were paid successfully.

loans.use: to buy water pipes, fertilizer, and pesticides

loans.name: Beatha

texts.en: Beatha is 34 years old. She is married and has six children. With the loan, she would like to buy sugar, cooking oil, and rice for resale. The profits from the business will be used to buy a house. She was successful with the previous loans in restocking inventory for the business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking oil, and rice for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothing for her business

loans.name: Jaime Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Jaime ha sentido el impacto y satisfacción que produce el ver a un negocio propio crecer y ser prospero.
Desde hace 8 años tiene una cafetería que empezó como un pequeño establecimiento donde solo se vendían golosinas y uno que otro almuerzo, pero hoy en día se ha convertido en una cafetería y restaurante con unas muy buenas ventas y ganancias.
Se puede apreciar claramente el esfuerzo que ha hecho este señor de mente emprendedora y creativa para sacar su negocio adelante y hacerlo sostenible.
El genera empleo a una señora que es madre cabeza de hogar y uno de sus sueños es poder ampliar su negocio y poder ofrecer muchos más empleos.
Por eso solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de surtido como frituras, bebidas, entre otros y así ofrecer oportunamente sus productos a sus clientes.
Un desafío que enfrenta este hombre son las condiciones de salud que actualmente está atravesando y que lo ha hecho reducir en varias ocasiones su ritmo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Jaime has felt the impact of the satisfaction that comes from seeing a business grow and become prosperous.
For 8 years, he has had a cafe that began as a small shop where he sold only candy and the occasional lunch but today it has become a cafe and restaurant with very good sales and profits.
One can clearly appreciate the effort that has made this man with an enterprising and creative mind take his business forward and make it sustainable. He employs a woman who is a single mother and one of his dreams is to expand his business and offer more jobs.
He is applying for a loan to invest in the purchase an assortment of goods like fried food, drinks, and other things in order to offer his products to customers in a timely manner.
A challenge faced by this man is his health conditions that he is currently going through that have had to repeatedly reduce his working hours.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products for his store such as fried food, soft drinks, drinks, and other things

loans.name: Raul Andres

texts.es: Andrés es un joven de 22 años de edad, vive con sus padres que se dedican a vender frutas en el mercado y con una hermana y una sobrina, Andrés no pudo terminar sus estudios secundarios por falta de recursos económicos ya que a sus padres no les alcanzaba  cubrir sus gastos, Andres se dedica 6 años a la agricultura, comenta que se ayuda en sus cultivos con los créditos que le da Fodemi, en esta ocasión va a sembrar quinua ya que este producto deja buena ganancia, el crédito lo va a invertir en la preparación del terreno, en la compra de abono y fungicidas y en el pago de mano de obra para la siembra, su aspiración es que su cultivo le deje buenos ingresos para ingresar nuevamente al colegio y terminar sus estudios y de ser posible ayudar a sus padres.
texts.en:
Andrés is a 22 year old young man.  He lives with his parents.  He sells fruit at the market with a sister and a niece.  Andrés was not able to complete high school due to the lack of financial resources.  His parents did not have enough to cover his expenses.

Andres has been working in agriculture for six years.  He says that the loans from Fodemi help him with his crops.  At this time he will plant quinoa because this product gives good profits.  He will use the loan to invest in the preparation of the land and in buying fertilizer and fungicides.  He will also pay for the labor for planting.  

His hope is that his crop gives him good income so that he can once again go to school and finish his education.  He also wishes to be able to help his parents.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides.

loans.name: Academic Group

texts.en:
Eyi is the featured borrower of the Academic Group. She gets along with the other group members, and held hands when they applied for a loan from Kiva partner ID-Ghana, so that they can fulfill their needs.

Eyi is a 34-year-old single mother of two children. Ten years ago, she started working at her house, selling fruits and cereal, to support her children's education and herself. Her incomes isn't enough to cover her children's increasing needs. For this reason, her portion of the requested loan will be invested in buying fresh fruits and cereal that will attract her customers’ attention and increase her income.

Eyi hopes to expand her business in the future, and move to a bigger shop. The other group members are Comfort and Jumai.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits and cereal that will attract her customers’ attention and increase her income

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose es estudiante de la carrera de derecho, es un joven muy dedicado que esta luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida. comenta que su anterior préstamo lo uso para poder pagar sus gastos de titulación, lo que le fue muy útil.
Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder seguir cubriendo sus gastos de titulación, y de esa forma poder finiquitar esa cuenta que tiene. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Jose is studying for a law degree. He is a very responsible young man that is fighting to improve his living conditions. He shared with us that he used his previous loan to pay his tuition fees, which was very helpful for him.

He is now asking for a new loan to continue covering his tuition fees and in this way he will be able to settle the bills that he has. He is thankful for the opportunity that he is receiving.

loans.use: To pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing like polos, sweaters, pants, and other goods for her store

loans.name: Augustina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Augustina Del Carmen tiene 24 años de edad, vive en el Distrito de Morropon, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, una comunidad de clima caluroso; ubicado en la Provincia del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas como gaseosas en el restaurante de su madre donde ella viene trabajando como su asistente, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de gaseosas y de esta manera ofrecerlo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Agustina del Carmen is 24 years old and lives in the District of Morropon. The people engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This community has a warm climate and is located in Morropon Province, which is part of the region of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

Agustina sells beverages, such as sodas, at her mother’s restaurant where she works as her assistant. She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 500 PEN so that she can buy a larger quantity of sodas that she can offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of sodas to sell.

loans.name: Richar Ramos Lopez

texts.es:
El señor Richard es un  hombre emprendedor y con muchas ganas de trabajar, pues de dedica a la comercialización de pescado en el Municipio de Montería, en una pequeña chaza ubicada en la plaza de mercado de la región.
Esta actividad la ejerce a raíz de conseguir más ingresos para su familia compuesta por su esposa y dos hijos pequeños de 10 y 12 años, a los cuales desea ofrecerles la mejor educación y calidad de vida que sus fuerzas puedan brindarle.
Entre sus sueños están el de tener su propia mercadería de pescados que le generen ingresos estables y beneficios económicos.
Acude a un impulso económico para comprar surtido de pescado al por mayor y así generar mayor utilidad al comprarlas de contado.
texts.en:
Señor Richar is an entrepreneurial man with a great will to work. He sells fish on the El Plátano sidewalk in the town of Monteria, in a little stall located on the market plaza.

He carries out this activity with the purpose of obtaining more income for his family, which consists of his wife and two little children, ages 10 and 12, to whom he wants to offer the best education and quality of life that his efforts can provide.

Among his dreams is having his own fish market, which would generate a stable income and economic benefits for him.

He is turning to a financial boost in order to buy a wholesale stock of fish and thus generate bigger profits by buying them for cash.

loans.use: to buy a bigger stock of fish to sell

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is the proud owner of Cal State Vape. George was raised in Gardena by a single mother. When George was 17, he dropped out of school and starting running with the wrong crowd. He began using drugs and things went downhill from there.  It was only by luck that he did not end up in jail. Finally hitting rock bottom at the age of 34, he sought help at the Salvation Army. He is now 46 and has been a sober member of Alcoholics Anonymous ever since.  

George came to a point in his life where he felt something was missing.  He then decided to try to start his own business.  George was a pack a day smoker since he was 13 years old. He tried everything to quit, including the patch, nicotine gum and Chantix.  Nothing worked.  One day, a friend of his showed him his new Vape Pen and told him how it had helped with quitting smoking when nothing else had worked.  Shortly thereafter, he quit smoking and has been Vaping ever since.  George realized that being able to help people quit smoking the way it had helped him quit smoking would not only help with supporting his family but could help other people quit smoking and potentially save lives.

loans.use: To purchase inventory and open a store front

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es: Feliciano vive en la ciudad de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería, él es una persona responsable que por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Camino al Progreso” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal para comprar vacas, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Feliciano lives in the city of Paucartambo.  He is a hard worker and entrepreneur who gets his family ahead through the efforts of his work. His main occupation is agriculture and raising livestock.  

Feliciano is a responsible person, and for that reason he was invited to join the communal bank "Camino al Progresso" ["Path to Progress"].  This time he is asking for a personal loan to purchase cattle.  

Feliciano appreciates and values ​​the loan and he agrees, with great responsibility, to comply with the payment of his monthly installments.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Flor Simiona

texts.es: Flor Simiona se dedica a brindar servicio de hospedaje pues tiene un local donde llegan pasajeros extranjeros y nacional. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora que pertenece al banco comunal “Paititi”. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las habitaciones. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en: Flor Simiona has a hotel that caters to local and foreign travelers. She has had this business for several years, and things are going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  She is a hardworking and enterprising person and is a member of the communal bank "Paititi".  She is currently seeking a loan in order to perform maintenance on her hotel rooms.  She is grateful for the opportunity and promises to repay her loan on time.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her hotel rooms.

loans.name: José Guillermo

texts.es:
José de 37 años no tiene ningún grado de estudio debido a la pobreza de su familia, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos. Vive en la casa de sus padres por lo que son 4 personas que dependen de él.


José actualmente trabaja en la agricultura y lo ha hecho desde que era niño, lo aprendió de su padre; además del trabajo en la agricultura trabaja como jornalero en un cañal, en la cual tiene un horario de 7:00 a 11:00 a.m. y el resto del día  lo emplea en su trabajo.


El dinero del préstamo será utilizado para pagar el alquiler de las tierras donde trabajara este año, pues si no lo hacen rápido perderá la parcela que le alquilan.


El sueño de José es: Tener su propia vivienda, poder ver crecer a sus hijos y darles el estudio que el no tubo, ayudar a sus padres para que ellos no pasen ninguna necesidad.
texts.en:
Thirty-seven-year-old Jose has no schooling due to the poverty of his family.  He is in a relationship and his partner makes a living doing domestic work.  He lives in his parent's house where there are four people who depend on him.  

Jose now works in agriculture which he has done since he was a child.  He learned it from his father.  Besides agricultural work, he works as a day-laborer in a cane field where his schedule is from 7:00 to 11:00 a.m.  He uses the rest of the day for his work.

The money from the loan will be used to pay the rent for the lands where he will work this year.  If not done quickly, he will lose the parcel which they rent to him.

Jose's dream is to have his own house; to be able to watch his children grow and to give them the schooling that he did not have; and to help his parents so that they suffer no need.

loans.use: to pay the rent for the lands he will work this year.  If not done quickly, he will lose the parcel which they rent to him.

loans.name: Javier Shani

texts.es: Javier se dedica a la venta de madera y lo transporta a la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora que pertenece al banco comunal “Paititi”. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mas madera. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en: Javier sells wood and brings it to the city of Cusco.  He has been involved in the business for several years, and things are going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  He is a hardworking and enterprising person who is a member of the communal bank "Paititi".  At present he needs a loan in order to purchase more wood.  He is grateful and appreciative for the loan opportunity and promises to comply with his monthly repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase more wood.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: La señora Noemí tiene 31  años, es casada tiene dos hijos de 10 y 3 años,  ella se dedica  a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad en su  tienda de barrio que se encuentran ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la zona de Plan 4000 de la ciudad de Santa Cruz,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Noemí va a usar este préstamo para a la compra de mercadería para surtir su negocio como abarrotes, dulces, galletas y variedad de refrescos, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es necesidad de surtir su tienda ya que esta época tiene mucha demanda, la señora Noemí enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que en la zona hay muchas tiendas de barrio, ella va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando mercadería y así incrementar su capital y poder tener un almacén ya que este es uno deseos, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Noemí is a 31-year-old married woman, with two children who are ages 3 and 10.  She sells groceries out of her neighborhood shop, which is located in her own home.  She lives in the Plan 4000 zone in the city of Santa Cruz.  This is her first loan from this institution.  She will use this loan in order to purchase merchandise to stock her store, such as groceries, sweets, cookies and a variety of soft drinks.

Her reason for seeking this loan is that she needs to stock her store, since during this time of year there is a great deal of demand.  She faces challenges in her business, such as competition from the many other stores in her neighborhood.  She will use the proceeds to continue buying merchandise and thus increase her inventory and be able to have a storage area, which is one of the things that she wants.  She is grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to supply her business.

loans.name: Jose Adalberto

texts.es: Jose de 39 años de edad se dedica desde hace 2 años a la crianza y venta de pollos, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposa, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra vitaminas y concentrado para los pollos y asi continuar con la crianza y poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Jose is 39 years old and has been raising and selling chickens for the past two years in the various markets near his home.  He has his own home and lives with his wife and two children.  Jose is asking for a loan to buy vitamins and feed for the chickens so he can continue raising them and provide better financial stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and feed.

loans.name: Will Alfredo

texts.es: Will tiene 33 años de edad y desde hace 14 años trabaja como operario en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Will es un hombre trabajador y responsable de quien su vecinos dan buenas referencias de su integridad. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para repellar las paredes de la vivienda  y posteriormente pintarlas ya que es su único patrimonio y desea darle mantenimiento para que las paredes tengan una mayor duración.
texts.en: Will is 33 years old and for the last 14 years he has worked as a worker in a business near his home. Will is hard-working and responsible and his neighbors give good references in regards to his integrity. With the goal of improving his living conditions, he asks for this loan from FUSAI to whitewash the walls of his house and later to paint them since it is his only asset and he wants to maintain it so the walls last longer.

loans.use: to buy: sand, cement and paint to whitewash and paint the walls of his house

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson is a married man. He has six children. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a retail business where he sells washing soap, eggs, sugar and other items. His business is located in a competitive location and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. 

Jackson will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stock of washing soap, sugar and other items. His business goal is to own a supermarket within five years. This is his  third  loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. He will use the anticipated profits to add more stock.

loans.use: to buy more stock of washing soap, sugar, and other items

loans.name: Al- Forsan Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al- Forsan 3. It consists of four women who are all hard-working. They live in Hodeidah, Yemen. They have taken a loan of 180,000 YER. 

Aeda is 39 years old and a married woman with two children. Her older child is 11 years old and the younger one is 7 years old. She studied till secondary school, but she couldn't complete her studies. Recently, she knows her advantage very well. She has a strong determination to improve her standard of living. She says she had a small amount of money which she saved up herself. Aeda invested that money in her own business. She started her business four years ago, selling makeup, accessories, and ready-made women's clothes in order to help her husband with the expenses of the family. She sees this business as a profitable one for her. For further expansion, Aeda requested a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more accessories, makeup, cosmetics, and women's clothes to sell to the women in her area.

 Aeda expects a boost in her income. She looks forward to expanding her business through selling more accessories, makeup, and ready-made women's clothes.

loans.use: to purchase more accessories, makeup, cosmetics, and women's clothes to sell to the women in her area.

loans.name: Anipa

texts.ru: Анипа, 39 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Анипы- средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи на данный момент она занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1990 году с суммы 8,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря целеустремленности, трудолюбию и нацеленности на результат Анипы, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 3 дойные коровы и 10 овец. Дополнительно Анипа реализует молоко. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анипа обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для покупки коровы. Анипа намерена увеличить поголовье скота, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Anipa is 39 years old, married, and the mother of four children.  She has a specialized secondary education and is currently involved in animal husbandry, an activity which provides her family with its main source of income.  She started in this business in 1990 with an initial capital of 8,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her perseverance, hard work and her focus on the objectives she has set, she currently owns three dairy cows and 10 sheep.  Additionally, she sells milk.  She makes a monthly income of about 10,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her farming business, she has turned to the micro-finance bank "Bai Tushum" and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow.  She is planning to increase her cattle headcount, which will directly lead to an increase of the family's capital.  She plans to use the earnings from her loan to buy some furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Lourdes Maritza

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos más conocido como Cantón del amor lleno de gente amable y trabajadora, es un lugar muy turístico, por las diversas cascadas y hosterías y el maravilloso clima, aquí encontramos la cascada del amor al cual se puede llegar muy rápido por el maravilloso teleférico que poseen en este Cantón.
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio la señora Lourdes una mujer luchadora, es casada, de esa larga y muy buena relación tiene 2 hijos la mayor de 23 años y el ultimo de 7 años, el esposo trabaja en el sector como chofer profesional en un taxi, ella tiene una pequeña granja porcina a la cual le dedica un promedio de 5 horas al día, de este negocio aprendió desde su niñez junto con los papas ellos son de bajos recursos económicos y siempre tuvieron que trabajar muy duro para salir adelante. 
Solicita este crédito para invertir en el negocio y en la casa, arreglará el techo y piso de las chancheras y de la casa arreglará los interiores, con esta nueva inversión mejorara su calidad de vida y el de su familia , la señora Lourdes agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos, better known as the Settlement of Love is full of friendly, hardworking people.  It’s a tourist area because of the many waterfalls and hostels.  It’s a marvelous climate and here is where we find the waterfall of love, which can be easily reached because of the wonderful sky tram in this settlement.

This settlement is where Lourdes lives and has her business.  She is a very striving woman, is married and has two children; the oldest daughter being 23 and the youngest son being 7.  Her husband works in the area as a taxi driver and she has a small pig farm where she works an average of five hours a day.  She learned to do this when she was a child.  Her parents were poor and always had to work very hard to get ahead.

She is asking for this loan to invest into her business and her house.  She will fix up the floor in the pig pens and fix up the inside of her house.  This investment will improve the quality of life for her family.  Lourdes is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support.

loans.use: to fix up the pigpen.

loans.name: Las Retamas De Exaltación Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS RETAMAS DE EXALTACIÓN” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Katya es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ollas, venta de salteñas (empañadas tradicionales bolivianas), venta de CD’s, elaboración de manualidades, venta de comida, ferretería, venta de pasteles.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Katya es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de pastelería; nos cuenta que este negocio lo inicio desde niña, posteriormente decidió vender sus productos a las pastelerías, posteriormente, con un capital ya establecido, emprendió un negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de harina por mayor) que adquirirá en las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el servicio que le ofrece los compañeros que le ofrecen en la institución.
texts.en:
The “LAS RETAMAS DE EXALTACIÓN” communal bank will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Exaltacion center.  It’s made up of eight members and directed by a board of directors where Kataya serves as the president.  The members’ businesses include pots and pan sales, salteñas sales (traditional Bolivian empanadas), CD sales, crafts, food sales, hardware store, and cake sales.

This loan will benefit their small businesses including Katya’s.  She is just starting with Pro Mujer, having joined on the invitation of a promoter who visited her at home.  She sells pastries and says that she started the business when she was a young girl.  She later decided to sell her pastries to cake shops and then set up an independent business with the capital.

She is asking for a loan to buy flour in quantity from the wholesale vendors in El Alto and use it in her work area.  This type of work will allow her to generate more income to support her family since she is single and has a son.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she says that she likes the services offered.

loans.use: to buy flour

loans.name: Melvin Francisco

texts.es:
Son las seis de la mañana, un niño sonriente y con el uniforme escolar reluciente es el primero en abordar el transporte escolar de Melvin, esa sonrisa es la que lo hace trabajar con esmero y dedicación. El tiene 62 años de edad, está casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Hace unos años, en una iglesia adventista, inició su trabajo como transportista, con un préstamo logró comprar el bus con el que labora, lo que le ha ayudado a brindar un mejor servicio y aumentar su clientela. Su esposa es su mano derecha, cuidan el uno del otro. 
Melvin solicita el crédito para acondicionar su microbús, requiere comprar algunos accesorios, como espejo, luces, forros de asiento, entre otros. Él deposita su confianza en el financiamiento, con el que espera mejorar la atención al cliente. Es un hombre con visión de futuro, anhela construir un segundo piso en su casa de habitación para alquiler de apartamentos a estudiantes y al mismo tiempo instalar una ferretería en el piso de abajo. Su trabajo le brinda estabilidad económica, aspira seguir laborando hasta brindarle un futuro seguro a su familia.
texts.en:
It is six o'clock in the morning. A smiling boy with a bright school uniform is the first one to board Melvin's school transport. This smile is what makes him work with care and dedication. He is 62 years old. He is married and has four children. Some years ago, in an Adventist church, he began his work in transportation. With a loan, he managed to buy the bus with which he works, which has helped him to offer better service and increase his clientele. His wife is his right hand; they care for each other.

Melvin is applying for a loan to renovate his microbus. He needs to buy some accessories such as a mirror, lights, and seat covers, among other items. He places his confidence in the loan, with which he hopes to improve his attention to his customers. He is a man with a vision of the future. He wants to build a second floor on his house in order to rent apartments to students and at the same time to set up a hardware store on the lower floor. His work offers him economic stability. He strives to continue working to offer a secure future to his family.

loans.use: to renovate his microbus. He needs to buy some accessories, such as a mirror, lights, and seat covers, among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise and improve the appearance of the shop

loans.name: José Alfredo

texts.es:
José de 32 años de edad,  por sus escasos recursos económicos no tuvo  la oportunidad de estudiar más que segundo grado. Está acompañado, su compañera de vida trabaja en la agricultura con él, tienen un niño de 3 años y viven en casa de su suegra, por lo tanto tres personas dependen de él.


José trabaja en la agricultura y lo ha hecho desde que era niño, lo aprendió de sus padres ya que ellos toda su vida trabajaron en la agricultura. Se traslada 3 km en bicicleta para llegar al lugar donde tiene su parcela. No tiene un horario de trabajo ya que hasta que termina de hacer lo que tiene programado regresa a su casa.


El dinero del préstamo será utilizado para la siembra de maíz,  comprara semilla, fertilizantes, herbicidas, pesticidas, y mano de obra; ya que en estos días es cuando ellos empiezan a trabajar.


Los sueños de José son: Tener una vivienda propia porque donde vive es alquilado, poder darle a su hijo el estudio que él no tuvo para que pueda tener una mejor oportunidad en la vida.
texts.en:
José, 32 years old, did not have the opportunity to attend school beyond the second grade due to scarce economic resources. He has a partner and his life companion works in agriculture with him. They have a three year old son and live in his mother-in-law’s house, therefore three people depend on him.

José is a farmer and he has been one since he was a child; he learned from his parents because they were farmers all of their lives. He travels 3 kilometers by bicycle in order to reach the place where he has his plot. He does not have a work schedule since he just works until he finishes what he has to before he returns home.

The money from the loan will be used for cultivating corn. He will buy seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides and pay labor costs, since these are the days when the work begins.

José’s dreams are: to own a home because the place where they live now is rented, and to give his son the education that he did not have so  he will have a better opportunity in life.

loans.use: to cultivate corn and buy seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Jocote Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por 3 mujeres emprendedoras de la comunidad de Lamlaya, que se localiza a 30 minutos de la Ciudad de Bilwi, Municipio Puerto Cabezas, se unieron para poder acceder a financiamiento mediante crédito para ir incrementando sus pequeños negocios y mejorar sus ingresos. Todas ellas quieren lograr mejorar sus condiciones de vida, poder cubrir las necesidades básicas, asegurar la educación de sus hijos, mejorar sus viviendas.

Justina: Es integrante del Grupo Solidario Jocote, tiene 56 años de edad, madre soltera, tiene 12 hijos, de los cuales 9 son mayores de edad e independientes y 3 cursan su secundaria. Desde hace 30 años, se dedica a la comercialización de mariscos, venta de bolis de manera ambulante. Con el propósito de incrementar sus productos, solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar mariscos en la comunidad de Lamlaya y venderlos a precios accesibles en Bilwi.  Su sueño es mejorar su vivienda de tambo de madera, con el objetivo de reducir el hacinamiento y vivir de manera segura y digna, ya que actualmente dispone de un solo espacio (Cocina, sala y cuartos), en el cual habitan 8 personas. También anhela con comprar un tramo en el mercado municipal de Puerto Cabezas y vender ropa usada.

Almaira: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, es madre soltera de un menor de 10 meses. Desde hace 3 años vende de madera ambulante mariscos. Solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar mariscos en la comunidad de Lamlaya y venderlos a precios accesibles en Bilwi.  Su sueño es tener una pulperia

Ermelinda: Es la Coordinadora del Grupo Solidario Jocote, tiene 25 años de edad, madre soltera de 3 hijos, el mayor de 8 años estudia su segundo grado de primaria y tiene dos menores de edad. Vende bastimento, mariscos y pescado seco en la parada de buses. Solicita su primer crédito para comprar: yuca, plátanos, pilipitas, cuadrados, malanga, mariscos e insumos para elaborar bolis que los vende en su casa. Sueña con llegar a tener una pulpería
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of 3 enterprising women from the community of Lamlaya, located 30 minutes from the City of Bilwi, Puerto Cabezas municipality. They assembled to be able to obtain a loan to continue to increase their small businesses and improve their incomes. They all want to improve their living conditions, to cover their basic necessities, to secure their children’s education, and to improve their housing.

Justina: Is a member of “Grupo Solidario Jocote.”  She is 56 years old, and a single mother with 12 children; 9 of which are older and independent and 3 who are in secondary school. For 30 years she has been working as a street vendor selling shellfish, and ice cream treats. She is requesting her first financing for the purpose of increasing her products by purchasing shellfish in the Lamlaya community and selling it at affordable prices in Bilwi.  Her dream is to improve her wooden stilt house with the goal to reduce overcrowding and live safely and respectably. Now she has only one space (kitchen, living room and bedrooms), in which 8 people live. Also, she wishes to purchase a space in the market in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas and sell used clothing.

Almaira: Is from Puerto Cabezas, she is a single mother of a ten-month-old baby. She has been working as a street vendor for 3 years selling shellfish. She is requesting her first loan to purchase shellfish in the Lamlaya community and to sell it at affordable prices in Bilwi.  Her dream is to have a general store.

Ermelinda: She is the coordinator of the “Grupo Solidario Jocote.” She is 25 years old, and a single mother to 3 children; the eldest is 8 years old in second grade and the other two are younger. She sells provisions, shellfish, and dry fish at bus stops. She is requesting her first loan to purchase: cassava, bananas, pilipitas (type of banana), tuber (a local variety of potato), shellfish and supplies to make ice cream treats which she sells from her house. She dreams of having a general store.

loans.use: to purchase shellfish in the community of Lamlaya and sell it at affordable prices in Bilwi.

loans.name: Bety Yamileth

texts.es:
Bety es una mujer luchadora ama de casa y agricultora quien es soltera y madre de 5 hijos solo dos de ellos estudian y que a los otros tres no les gusto estudiar por los que diariamente lucha para que no le falte nada dentro de las necesidades básicas (alimentación, vestimenta, medicinas, entre otras). Su grado de estudio es de primaria incompleta la cual no pudo terminar por razones económicas las cuales en su familia no le permitían seguir adelante. Su mayor ingreso económico depende del cultivo de café el cual practica desde hace 10 años de forma independiente pues anteriormente sus ingresos dependían de la plantación o trabajo realizado en el campo de sus padres. También tiene un negocio de pulperia en su casa de habitacion la cual le ayudan a manejar sus hijos cuando ella está en el campo junto a su padre trabajando. El producto una vez cosechado y listo para su venta es comercializado en las bodegas de la comunidad encargándose de ese trabajo su padre pues él tiene muchos más contactos y le dan mejores precios por la trayectoria y transparencia. 
Bety solicita apoyo económico para la compra de fertilizantes agrícolas para asistir sus cultivos de café comprando lo necesario para evitar que su plantación sea afectada por plagas ya que está floreciendo y es necesario asistirla. Sus metas a corto plazo limpieza de su propiedad de café, el mantenimiento de las mismas al momento de abonarlas y fertilizarlas para que cuando cosechen lo hagan en abundancia. Como madre de familia fortalecer el patrimonio para sus hijos, apoyarlos en sus metas, estudios y demás necesidades que tengan para triunfar y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Bety is a tenacious woman; she is a housewife and a farmer. She is single and the mother of 5 children, only 2 of them are studying and the other 3 didn’t like school. It is for them that she struggles daily so that they are not lacking anything in the basic necessities (nutrition, clothing, medicine, amongst others). 

She did not complete primary school due to her family’s financial reasons which did not permit her to continue. Her greatest source of incomes comes from cultivating coffee. She has been doing this independently for 10 years, before this her income came from farming or work done in her parent’s fields. 

She also has a grocery store in her house which her children help her run when she is in the field working along with her father.  The product, once harvested and ready for market is sold in the community warehouses. Her father is in charge of that job since he has many more contacts and they give him better prices because of his experience and transparency. 

Bety is requesting economic support to buy agricultural fertilizers to help her coffee crops, she will buy what is necessary to prevent her field from being affected by a plague since it is blossoming and it is necessary to help it. Her short term goal is to clean her coffee property, the maintenance of it from the moment they are fertilized so that when they are harvested they are in abundance. 

As a mother she wishes to strengthen her children’s patrimony, support them in their goals, studies and the other necessities that they may be successful and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, and liquid plant food to clean and help her coffee crops.

loans.name: María Candelaria

texts.es:
María de 57 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en la agricultura junto a ella. Dos hijos viven con ellos, por lo que son dos personas que dependen de ella.

María actualmente trabaja en la agricultura y lo ha hecho desde que era niña, lo aprendió de sus padres pues ellos se dedicaban a trabajar en el campo, además de la agricultura se dedica a la crianza de gallinas indias, lo que le genera un ingreso adicional; horario de trabajo no tiene pues hasta que termina de hacer lo que tiene programado descansa.


El dinero del préstamo será utilizado para la siembra de maíz, además comprara 2 terrenos  los cuales le servirán para el trabajo en la agricultura.

Los sueños de María son: Poder ayudar a sus hijos en todo lo que este a su alcance, tener una vivienda digna, está segura que con la ayuda de Dios y los créditos lo podrá hacer posible.
texts.en:
María, 57 years old, attended school until the seventh grade. She has a partner and he works in agriculture with her. Two children live with them. Consequently two  people depend on her. 

María currently works as a farmer and she has done so since she was a child. She learned from her parents because they made a living working in the fields. In addition to agriculture, she also raises free range hens, which generate additional income. She does not have a work schedule since she does not rest until she has finished what she has to do.

The money from the loan will be used to cultivate corn. In addition, she will buy two plots of land that she will use to farm.

María’s dreams are: to be able to help her children achieve everything within their reach and to own a decent house. She is sure that with help from God and the loans she will be able to make it possible.

loans.use: to cultivate corn and purchase two plots of land that she will use for agricultural work.

loans.name: Asembubu

texts.ru: Асембубу 66 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Асембубу - высшее педагогическое образование, долгие годы проработала учителем в школе, в настоящий момент в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Стартовав в 1993 году, благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Асембубу на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 15 овец и 2 лошади, а также есть земельный надел мерою 1,50 ГА, на котором ежегодно она выращивает картофель и клевер для внутрихозяйственного использования и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Асембубу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Асембубу является членом группы "Береке-6", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека. Доходы от кредита Асембубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и хочет накопить средства на покупку трактора для младшего сына.
texts.en:
Asembubu is 66 years old, married, and raising three children with her husband.  She has a degree in education and worked for many years as a school teacher.  She is currently involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, two activities which provide her family with its main source of income.  She started in this business in 1993 and thanks to her hard work, she now owns two cows, 15 sheep, two horses, as well as a 1.5 hectare of land on which she annually grows potatoes and clover for the family's own consumption and resale.  She makes a monthly income of 11,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her farming business, she has turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy calves for cattle breeding.

Asembubu is a member of the "Bereke-6" group which includes two more members.  Asembubu is planning to invest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her cattle headcount.  She would also like to save enough money to buy a tractor for her youngest son.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Wendyaolenzingba Group

texts.fr:
Mme MAMOUNATA est responsable de groupe WENDYAOLENZINGBA. Mariée, elle est mère de 05enfants. Le plus âgé 35ans, le moins âgé 12ans. 03 vont à l’école. Elle a 04personnes en charge.
Mme fait la restauration depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur.
Elle veut s’acheter 20plats d’haricot et 05tas de bois de chauffe.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut scolariser ses enfants et payer des vivres pour la famille. Mme ambitionne construire une maisonnette devant sa cour pour la restauration.
texts.en:
Mamounata is the representative of the Wendyaolenzingba group.  She is married and the mother of five children.  Her oldest child is 35 years old and the youngest is 12.  Three of her children go to school.  Mamounata has four dependents.

Mamounata has been involved in the preparation of dishes for the past ten years.  She buys her supplies at the local market.  She wants to buy 20 bowls of beans and five bundles of firewood.

She wants to use her profits to educate her children and buy food supplies for her family.  Her goal is to build a small house in her front yard and to use that house as a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy 20 bowls of beans and 5 bundles of firewood.

loans.name: Centro De Riyos Group

texts.es: Jorge, Ángel y Agustina decidieron formar un grupo para solicitar un préstamo a VisionFund México. Ellos comentan que se formaron a partir de que Don Ángel tuvo la inquietud de surtir su tienda de abarrotes con la cual lleva 20 años, él con mucha seguridad visitó a Jorge quien ahora es el representante del grupo por ser el más joven de los 3 (se encuentra al centro de la imagen). Jorge tiene la visión de cuidar el negocio que le dejó su padre al morir ya que durante muchos años fue una herramienta de trabajo que les brindó la oportunidad de sacar adelante a su familia, ahora Jorge solicito nuevamente un crédito para comprar herramientas con las cuales podrá seguir ofreciendo su servicio, "Es muy satisfactorio ver como la gente queda contenta por su trabajo". comenta Jorge quien a sus 27 años y sin responsabilidad alguna trabaja para conservar la excelente herencia que su padre le dejó, ahora le encantaría comenzar  con un negocio de venta de forrajes ya que en su comunidad la mayoría de las personas se dedican a la cría y engorda de ganado y Jorge ha notado que hace falta un negocio como el que tiene en mente para que sus vecinos no tengan que desplazarse hasta el centro de su municipio para conseguir el alimento de sus animales; comenta que gracias a VisionFund podrá hacer su sueño realidad. Doña Agustina es una integrante más del Grupo Centro Rioyos, ella se animó a formar parte del grupo ya que observó lo bien que les va a sus compañeros, ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes comenta que su pequeña tienda no cuenta con todos los productos que sus vecinos le piden y eso a ella la pone muy triste, pero con mucho gusto ella sigue con la venta de abarrotes gracias a los créditos de VisionFund ella ha podido tener mejor surtida su tienda. Ahora los 3 comparten un mismo pensar ya que si ellos pagan en tiempo y forma podrán seguir adquiriendo y aprovechando los beneficios de Kiva y la organización.
texts.en:
Jorge, Ángel and Augustina decided to form a group to request a loan from VisionFund Mexico. They say they formed the group when Ángel became worried about stocking his grocery store, which he has had for 20 years. Ángel confidently approached Jorge, who now is the representative of the group because he is the youngest of the three (Jorge is in the center of the photo).

Jorge had the vision to look after the business his father left him when he died. This business was for many years an economic tool that gave his father the opportunity to provide for his family. Now, Jorge is again requesting a loan to buy tools with which he can continue to offer his services. “It’s a real satisfaction to make people happy with your work,” says Jorge, who at 27 years and without responsibilities is working to preserve the excellent inheritance his father left him. Now he would like to start a feed sales business, because a majority of his community works raising cattle. Jorge has noticed the need for a business like he has in mind so that his neighbors do not have to travel to the center of the municipality to buy feed for their animals. He says that thanks to VisionFund, he will be able to make his dream a reality.

Agustina is another member of the Centro De Riyos Group. She was motivated to join the group by observing how well it was going for the other members. Agustina works selling groceries. She says that she does not have in her little store all of the products that her neighbors ask for, which makes her sad. But she is happy to continue with her business, and thanks to loans from VisionFund, she has been able to better stock her store.

Now the three share the same thinking, which is that if they make their payments on time, they will be able to continue to enjoy the benefits of Kiva and the organization.

loans.use: to buy tools with which he can continue to offer his services

location.town: Rioyos Buenavista, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: Reina Del Carmen

texts.es: Reina tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos de 20 años y 19 años y una nieta de 5 años de edad. Reina se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella es una mujer muy trabajador quien con mucho esfuerzo va sacando adelante a su familia. Reina desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el techo de la vivienda y en el piso de la misma. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo de piso, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder proceder a las mejoras lo antes posibles.
texts.en:
Reina is 49 years old and lives in a house she owns with her children, who are 20 and 19 years old, and a 5-year-old granddaughter.

Reina has been selling tortillas for a long time. She is a very hardworking woman who has been helping her family get ahead through a lot of effort. 

 She wants to improve conditions in her dwelling and has decided to apply for this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in a roof and a floor for her house.  With the money she has requested, she will buy cement, sand, gravel, brick flooring, etc. She hopes to be able to rely on this funding so that she can  proceed with improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, brick flooring, etc., to repair the roof and floor of her dwelling.

loans.name: Rokhaya

texts.fr: Madame Rokhaya est une femme qui marié et mère de famille qui habite à quelques kilomètres de la ville ou se trouve le Guichet. Elle évolue dans la commercialisation des habits de femmes et des draps. Elle a une expérience de 8 ans et démarre sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 22h. Elle demande ce montant pour acheter des tissus comme des wax et Bazin et des draps destinés à la vente.  Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. A l’avenir elle souhaite avoir un restaurant au niveau du marché de sa commune et diversifier son activité. Ainsi elle pourra augmenter ses revenus et épargner de l’argent. De ce fait elle pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Rokhaya is married and she has a family.  She lives a few kilometers away from the town where the local branch of the UIMCEC is located.  She sells women's clothing and bedsheets.  She has been working in this field for eight years and works from 9AM until 10PM.  She is taking this loan to buy and resell fabrics such as wax-print and damask cloths.  She supports her husband with the management of the day-to-day expenses and the children's school fees.  In the future, she would like to diversify her activity and own a restaurant at her town's local market.  This will lead to an increase in her income and will also allow her to save some money, so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and ready-to-wear clothing for resale to her customers.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a widowed woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be trustworthy. She operates a farm where she grows crops. She has been involved in this business for 14 years. Her business is located in a productive location and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of sufficient working capital. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy farm inputs. Her business goal is to be prosperous within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP Micro finance Bank.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be trustworthy. She operates a beauty salon where she offers beauty services. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in a business friendly area, and her primary customers are local residents.

She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of sufficient working capital. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy beauty salon equipment. Her business goal is to be prosperous within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP Micro finance Bank.

loans.use: to buy beauty salon equipment.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en: Alphonsine is 46 years old. She sells foodstuff, and has been in the business for the past nine years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar, and cooking oil for resale. The profits from the business will be used to pay for the school fees.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Jaime Eduardo

texts.es:
Jaime Eduardo es un jove estudiante de Ingeniería Industrial, él solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativo, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Jaime, Tengo 21 años de edad, actualmente estoy viviendo en Villa Duarte, Santo Domingo Este, tengo dos hermanos y una hermana, soy soltero y sin hijos, mi padre falleció recientemente y mi madre es empleada pública. 
Actualmente estudio en la Universidad Nacional Pedro Henriquez Ureña (UNPHU),  ingeniería industrial, ya que me gustaría manejar los procesos industriales, poder mejorar los servicios de una empresa y diseñar u mejorar la seguridad industrial. He tomado varias materias en esta carrera, mis favoritas son Tecnología de alimentos, psicología industrial, investigación de operación y dibujo industrial.
La necesidad de solicitar es debido a que quien costeaba mis estudios era mi padre, que lamentablemente falleció hace 2 meses y si no recibiera este préstamo no podré lograr el sueño que más anhelaba mi padre, poder verme graduado y esto afectaría mucho mi nivel de vida, el no poder recibir esta gran mano de ayuda, pero si lo obtengo cambiaria totalmente mi vida ya que podré cumplir mi meta y el sueño de mi padre.
Después de graduarme quisiera hacer una maestría y poder trabajar en mi área para logar mejorar los servicios de una empresa, seguridad y logística.
texts.en:
Jaime Eduardo is a young student of Industrial Engineering.  He is requesting a loan in order to cover his education expenses.  This is his story:

My name is Jaime, I am 21 years old and currently I am living in Villa Duarte, Santo Domingo.  I have two brothers and a sister.  I am single and do not have any children.  My father passed away recently and my mother is a civil service employee. Currently I study industrial engineering at Universidad Nacional Pedro Henriquez Ureña (UNPHU).  I have taken various classes in this field and my favorites are Food Technology, Industrial Psychology, Operation Investigation and Industrial Drawing.  The need of requesting a loan is tied to who was funding my studies, which was my father.  He unfortunately passed away 2 months ago and if I don't receives this loan, I will not be able to achieve the dream that my father was most hoping for, which was to be able to see me graduate.  Not being having this great helping hand would significantly affect my standard of living.  But if I were to obtain this help, my life would completely change as I would be able to fulfill my goals and the dream of my father.  After graduating, I would like to get a masters degree and be able to work in my field in order to improve business services, security and logistics

loans.use: to cover costs of higher education.

loans.name: Luís Omar

texts.es:
Luis de 62 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado de educación. Su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos tuvieron en común 4 hijos de los cuales ninguno está con ellos son hogares a parte,  en casa del cliente viven solamente 2 personas.

El cliente trabaja como motorista. Se dedicado desde hace 30 años a la actividad. Antes de dedicarse a esta actividad se dedicaba a trabajar como  ordenanza en una alcaldía municipal de su municipio y por cuestiones de salud lo jubilaron. Debido a eso el cliente se vio en la necesidad de volver a trabajar en lo que aprendió, ya que la pensión no le ajusta para cubrir las necesidades que tiene. 


 El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar bloque, Cemento, Lámina  porque hay una parte de su casa que se está deteriorando y desea arreglarlo antes  que comience el invierno. El préstamo le ayudara a cubrir  la necesidad que tiene de reparar su casa y tener en un lugar seguro a su esposa quien es una persona de edad.

Sus  sueños siguen siendo el de trabajar  para su familia y ayudarlos para que ellos cumplan sus sueños,  proteger a su esposa quien  es la persona que está a su lado.
texts.en:
Luis, age 62, was in school until ninth grade. His partner does the housework. They have 4 children together, none of whom live with them; they have their own homes. Luis and his wife live alone together.
Luis works as a driver. He has been doing this for 30 years. Before this job, he was a cleaner in a municipal building; he retired due to health issues. He felt it was necessary to go back to work in what he knows; his pension was not enough to cover his needs.
He will use this loan to purchase blocks, cement, and laminate because part of his home is deteriorating and he wants to fix it before the winter comes. This loan will help him to cover this need: to repair his home and have a safe place for his elderly wife.
His dream continues to be to work for his family and to help them to achieve their dreams, as well as to protect his wife, the person by his side.

loans.use: to purchase blocks, cement, and laminate, because part of his home is deteriorating.

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es:
Jorge de 63 años estudio hasta sexto grado, porque antes era difícil estudiar. Esta acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos. Tienen 5 hijos de los cuales dos viven en su casa los demás están casados.


Jorge actualmente trabaja en la agricultura y lo que hace desde hace 10 años, él antes de trabajar en la agricultura, vivió en Estados Unidos por 10 años, por problemas personales decidió regresar a El Salvador. Además de la agricultura compra ganado, que en término de un año lo está vendiendo. Es difícil que tiene un horario de trabajo pues todo lo que hace es propio.


El dinero del préstamo será invertido para la siembra de maíz y la compra de un ternero, él ya cuenta con un capital, por lo que el dinero del préstamo le servirá para completar lo que él tiene pensado hacer este año.

Los sueños de Jorge son: Poder ayudar a su familia en todo lo que está a su alcance, tener un vehículo para transportar la cosecha sabe que es un reto pero con la ayuda de Dios y su esfuerzo lo podrá hacer posible.
texts.en:
Jorge, 63 years old, went to school up to the sixth grade, because in the past it was difficult to go to school. He is in a relationship and his partner takes care of the household tasks. They have 5 children, of whom two live in their house and the rest are married. 

At the moment, Jorge works in agriculture, which has has done for the past 10 years. Before working in agriculture, he lived in the United States for 10 years, and for personal reasons he decided to return to El Salvador. In addition to the farmwork, he buys cattle, which he sells after a year. It's hard to define a work schedule since everything he does is his own.  

The money from the loan will be invested to buy corn seed, and to buy a calf. He already has some capital and the money from the loan will allow him to complete what he had planned to do this year.  

Jorge's dreams are: to be able to help his family with everything in his reach and have a vehicle to transport the harvest, which he knows is a challenge but with the help of God and his efforts, everything will be made possible.

loans.use: to plant corn and to buy a calf, he already has some capital and the money from the loan will allow him to complete what he had planned to do this year.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more spices, red oil, pepper, magi cube, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of cooking fat, washing soap and other items

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a 25-year-old single woman. She describes herself to be determined. She operates a retail business where she sells firewood. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a highly populated area, and her primary customers are the general public. She describes her biggest business challenge to be transportation. 

She will use the KES 100,000 loan to buy more stocks of firewood. Her business goal is to start selling petrol within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be self-dependent. This is her second loan with SMEP Micro finance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of firewood.

loans.name: N'pha

texts.en:
This is 35-year-old N'pha. He is married and has two children, aged 6 and 4 years. 

In 2010, N'pha established his clothing and slippers business. N’pha sells mainly T-shirts, jeans and slippers. He began his business because he started selling for his boss and later decided to open his own business. Working 7 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about Le 700,000 every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. N'pha requires a loan to buy more stock of T-shirts, jeans and slippers for his business. 

In the future, N'pha plans to improve his business and educate his children. He thanks you for your support and wishes you all the best.

loans.use: to buy more stock of T-shirts, jeans and slippers for his business.

loans.name: Rajab

texts.en:
Rajab is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be God-fearing. He operates a retail business where he sells clothes. He has been involved in this business for five years. His primary customers are the general public. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stocks of clothes. His business goal is to open a boutique within five years. This is his first loan with SMEP Micro finance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of clothes.

loans.name: Sallu

texts.en:
This is 45-year-old Sallu. He is married and has two children, aged 6 and 4 years; one is a school-going child. In 2009, Sallu established a charcoal and firewood business. He began his business because he had to take care of himself and his family, and to increase his earnings. 

Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about SLL 700,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000. Sallu requires a loan in order to purchase more charcoal and firewood for resale. 

In the future, Sallu plans to improve his business and give the best education to his children. He thanks you for your support and wishes you well.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal and firewood for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en: This is 31-year-old Zainab. She is married and has two children who are 10, 6, and 18 years old. In 2005, Zainab established her stationery and used clothing business.
